root.name: Spells of Gold
root.description: Spells of Gold was a European release in 2004, developed by Jonquil Software, and published by Buka Entertainment. The games main focus is on trade and commerce that the player takes part in. Buying and selling items and weapons to different towns is the shortlist of actions the player can do. Similar concepts are seen in modern games like Recettear: An Item Shop's Tale and Grand Theft Auto: Chinatown Wars.
